title: CCTVB新聞亂用香港起飛隻飛機，誤導觀眾

replies.msg:
https://www.facebook.com/inspiration.bkoo/posts/490596674620834

就日前香港青年在澳洲墨爾本學習駕駛飛機時，小型飛機意外墜毀身亡，香港起飛團隊表示非常難過和婉惜。

然而，就無綫電視在昨日(八月四日)於數段新聞報導中使用香港起飛B-KOO去年完成環球飛行抵港的片段，團隊表示非常困惑，並謹此作出以下聲明︰
1. 是此意外與香港起飛團隊，以及香港起飛的贊助商和支援機構無關。
2. 香港起飛B-KOO沒有發生任何意外。
3. 涉事飛機的型號和香港起飛B-KOO不同。

The Inspiration Team is saddened by the passing of a young Hong Kong trainee pilot who was taking a flying course in Melbourne, Australia. Our thoughts are with his family.

However, in the various reports of the accident by TVB News, the footage of Inspiration B-KOO returning from her Round-the-World Journey last year was used. The Inspiration Team is extremely confused and hereby makes the following statement.
1. The Inspiration Team, and the team's sponsors and supporting organisations are not related to the accident.
2. Inspiration B-KOO is not involved in any accident.
3. The plane involved in the accident is not of the same model as Inspiration B-KOO.
